snippet: American giants are benefiting from productivity gains and renewed growth in China and other overseas markets, allowing them to increase profits even if business at home remains lackluster.
abstract: Economic Memo; America's biggest companies are posting strong results in stock market, despite weak American economy; trend appears to be result of American giants' benefiting from productivity gains and renewed growth in China and other overseas markets, allowing them to increase profits even if business at home remains lackluster.
lead_paragraph: American giants are benefiting from productivity gains and renewed growth in China and other overseas markets, allowing them to increase profits even if business at home remains lackluster.

headline.seo: In Divided Market, the Bigger the Companies, the Better They Fare
headline.main: As Wall St. Soars in Tough Era, Company Size Is a Big Factor
headline.print_headline: As Wall St. Soars in Tough Era, Company Size Is a Big Factor
